General.Name: Universus Photo Imagings Limited
General.Description: Universus Photo Imagings Limited manufactures, sells, and trades in photographic and other imaging products. It offers photographic papers, roll films, NTR films, medical X-ray films, etc. The company was formerly known as Jindal Photo Imaging Limited and changed its name to Universus Photo Imagings Limited in December 2019. Universus Photo Imagings Limited was incorporated in 2011 and is based in Gurugram, India.
General.Address: Plot no. 12, Local Shopping Complex, New Delhi, India, 110 070
